header.jobName: U-Software Engineer(工作地：緯創軟體台北總部辦公室)
header.custName: 緯創軟體股份有限公司

language.ability: 聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通

condition.other:
Nice to have:
•	Familiar with Spring/Hibernate/GWT
•	Familiar with Unix/Linux system environment
•	Familiar with RDBMS 
•	Experience with Computer Vision
•	Experience with large client server systems
•	Familiar with Medical Imaging and DICOM standard 
•	Good conceptional knowledge of cloud services, container technologies, and CI/CD, such as: AWS, unit-testing, Jenkins, Docker

welfare.welfare:
※提供符合您身價，具競爭力的薪資
※每年多５天有薪個人假
※更多貼心福利制度
※ 獎金/禮品類 
1.年終獎金-視個人績效表現發放年終獎金、分紅等獎金 
2.紅利-視個人績效表現發放年終獎金、分紅等獎金
3.三節獎券/禮品
4.生日禮券
※ 保險類 
1.員工團保: 人壽險、意外險、醫療險、癌症險 
2.員工直系家屬團保: 人壽險、意外險、醫療險 
※ 休閒類 
1.不定期公司團體活動(旅遊/家庭日/電影/節慶) 
2.每月下午茶 
3.社團活動 
※ 制度類 
1.優渥的介紹獎金 
2.多元的教育訓練
※ 請 / 休假制度 
優於勞基法的休假制度-每年多５天有薪個人假
※ 其他 
1.每年定期健康檢查 
2.友善工作環境、多元休閒空間、女性同仁哺乳室 
3.年終尾牙餐會  
※ 補助類 
1.婚、喪、喜、慶補助
2.旅遊補助 
3.員工進修補助 
4.每月通訊費補助500元(一年6,000元)

jobDetail.jobDescription:
We are looking for a dedicated software engineer.
You will work with talented engineers, scientists, 
doctors, and medical domain experts across the world. 
Your responsibility will be developing and maintaining services. 
Also, there is a possibility that you work on data science tasks.

Key Responsibilities:
•	Develop and maintain the Clinical Trial Management Service
•	Integrate and troubleshoot imaging processing algorithms
•	Work with scientists to define the imaging processing pipelines
•	Help to develop the automation of workflows

Qualifications:
•	Programming experience with at least 2 of the following languages: Java, Python, or C++
•	Strong organizational skills and problem-solving ability
•	Fluent English language skills. Ability to work independently
